Articles.Content:
Alright I have a request I'm thinking of a flag with a tan or red background with the evolution of kerbals. Kinda like the picture of the evolution of humans. I'm thinking of like a Fern first them a bush then a tree and finally the kerbal with all of those in a plant green color. Can someone make this for me? Please

I know the devs have stated that kerbals are not plants but I like it for kind of a joke.

Sorry man, bit above my own paygrade.

Alright I have a request I'm thinking of a flag with a tan or red background with the evolution of kerbals. Kinda like the picture of the evolution of humans. I'm thinking of like a Fern first them a bush then a tree and finally the kerbal with all of those in a plant green color. Can someone make this for me? Please

I know the devs have stated that kerbals are not plants but I like it for kind of a joke.

I gave it a shot. Proper credit for the used Kerbal cartoon goes to David Westerberg (username Felsmak) who posted it on the forum. I know it looks strange to have the Kerbal being larger than the tree, but the other way around looked goofy. Hope this is what you wanted.
Something like this for my "Mun Mun Space agency"
thank you so much! now even if my lander tips over mun mun space agency is still successful!
if anyone here thats an Asimov fan could make "spaceship and sun" imperial flag and/or a Foundation one it would be great!!

if anyone here thats an Asimov fan could make "spaceship and sun" imperial flag and/or a Foundation one it would be great!!

Something like this?

Here's my submission
Heh! Its Goblin Enterprises, but it's good still. I have a bit of photoshop skills myself and can easily fix. Thanks!

I gave it a shot. Proper credit for the used Kerbal cartoon goes to David Westerberg (username Felsmak) who posted it on the forum. I know it looks strange to have the Kerbal being larger than the tree, but the other way around looked goofy. Hope this is what you wanted.

It looks pretty good. Thanks for doing it I could not figure out how to do it. It's not exactly what I was picturing but it'll work. Thanks again.
My signature is my best flag!

if anyone here thats an Asimov fan could make "spaceship and sun" imperial flag and/or a Foundation one it would be great!!

Posted this a little while ago in the other thread:

I've read all the books several times and I don't remember the Foundation ever having it's own emblem described, only the Empire.
Has someone looked at my request on page 20 yet? Just asking.

Posted this a little while ago in the other thread:

I've read all the books several times and I don't remember the Foundation ever having it's own emblem described, only the Empire.

Wow, that is awesome!! I've read them a few years ago, so I might be mistaken...

I'd like a flag made. http://img.ibtimes.com/www/data/images/full/2012/05/22/276448-the-spacex-falcon-9-rocket.jpg

Like this, but simplified. Not to mention a much more powerful-looking launch blast for the flag. (Possibly have "Banner" written on the bottom. Thin, wide letters. Should look high-tech and powerful.)

Has someone looked at my request on page 20 yet? Just asking.

Patience young padawan, vectors take time!

Replace 'Icarus' with whatever you like and i'll fling back an updated one (with the correct size). Unless you like it as it, in which case just click it and it'll take you to the 256x160 version.

Edited May 27, 2013 by Sli

If you don't mind...

Could you do a large grey-dark grey gear(With CUBE inside in black) surrounded by 3 smaller gears of the same color on a lighter grey background?

Thanks.

Also curious: could you use a .GIF file for a flag?

That's a lot of grey dude! I did a few different versions. They are full size here, but if you click on them the url will go to the usable 256x160 size.

If you don't mind, I'd like a flag with a blue background, a silver silhouette of an eagle with a sword in its talons flying to the left, and another of a dove holding an SRB flying to the right. Also, if it isn't too crowded, It'd be nice to have some space on the bottom for me to put in text. Thanks in advance!

Not quite as asked, but silver is very hard to get right! Plus I thought the white helped it stick out a bit better too. If you really want text it needs to be central, else it's unreadable or the logo becomes squished. Let me know!

Honestly though, I reckon this is pretty good just by itself:

Edited May 27, 2013 by Sli

Something like this for my "Mun Mun Space agency"

Epic reference, my fellow Tickldite!

Patience young padawan, vectors take time!

Replace 'Icarus' with whatever you like and i'll fling back an updated one (with the correct size). Unless you like it as it, in which case just click it and it'll take you to the 256x160 version.

Ah, thank you! I'll take this, and another one which says 'Banner', for that is my surname.

Icarus Space Program...hmm...thanks for the new idea!

Could someone make something Dr. Who related?

Perhaps a flag with a TARDIS on it?

Thanks

could you do me another flag please? greenish with waves, brazilian flag "overlaying" the wave template. Then, inside the blue ball of Brazil's flag, there is Brazilian Space Agency logo and written:

UP THE LOSANGLE: Brazilian Kerbonautic

DOWN THE LOSANGLE: Space Agency

Patience young padawan, vectors take time!

Replace 'Icarus' with whatever you like and i'll fling back an updated one (with the correct size). Unless you like it as it, in which case just click it and it'll take you to the 256x160 version.

Cool flag! Could you replace Icarus with ANDRÃƒâ€° with the accent above the E? And if it isn't too much to ask, could you also please give me one without the text so I can add my own when ever I want. Thanks.

Edited May 28, 2013 by walia6

Ah, thank you! I'll take this, and another one which says 'Banner', for that is my surname.

Icarus Space Program...hmm...thanks for the new idea!

Ah, no worries! It sounded like fill text haha. Here's an updated one:

Cool flag! Could you replace Icarus with ANDRÃƒâ€° with the accent above the E? And if it isn't too much to ask, could you also please give me one without the text so I can add my own when ever I want. Thanks.

I had a little trouble with the aigu since the type didn't support it. Hopefully this looks ok though:

Also a blank one here:

* BTW it looks like images that are double resolution will still work provided they are the same ratio. So you can use the 512x320 quality flags if you want, they should still show up. Clicking any of the above images will take you to the larger ones (since you're only after the links I didn't want to spam the page).

could you do me another flag please? greenish with waves, brazilian flag "overlaying" the wave template. Then, inside the blue ball of Brazil's flag, there is Brazilian Space Agency logo and written:

UP THE LOSANGLE: Brazilian Kerbonautic

DOWN THE LOSANGLE: Space Agency

Hey, I had a go at this, but there were a number of issues with what you are asking. The text is simply too small to read (and therefore would just look a blurry mess in game) if I wrap it around the logo like that, so I've made had to make it an acronym instead. Also The flag itself had a few too many stars in the middle that were getting in the way. I may have deleted a constellation or two. Oops.
Thanks this is great =D I will now restart my mun mission to use this flag!
Thank you Sli! No problem deleting the "constellations" (they were representing the ESTATES or STATES number we have in Brazil so... no problem!)
